name: ABRAXAS (ElectricButter, mfthepop)
description:
WELCOME

The story of this game is loosely based upon the the philosophy behind the gnostic God, Abraxas. A God that is the highest and the lowest within all axioms of opposite, being it almighty or helpless, good or evil, sacred or profane and so on. A God that is within and without all dimensions of existence and all that has been, is and will be.


Controlls:

Player 1 (Character):  W, A, S, D
Player 2 (Environment):  ↑, ↓, ←, →
PAUSE:  Esc


Developers' note:
We, as the developers of Abraxas, truly appreciate the time you're spending here! :)
We know this project has a lot of room for improvement, but we wanted to submit our game before the Jam's deadline in order to be in this competition and at the same time survive in real life, ie work, eat, study etc ...
However, we've decided that depending on how much love we receive on this game from you guys, we would put more work onto it and bring it to a much better standard!

With this said: the future of our line-figure, who used to be a God, is now your hands.
